## indexOfString() function

Find the index of a substring within a byte array. Returns -1 if not found.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function indexOfString(bytes: Uint8Array, needle: string, fromIndex?: number): number;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

number

Index of first occurrence or -1
